about_the_game:
Our goal is to build a project that lasts forever, and to challenge the industry with a new idea: communities can build free games that last longer, for less money. By becoming a donator on Steam, you are helping create a free game for the entire world to enjoy. Thank you.

By purchasing this DLC for $30, you're pledging an amount roughly equal to what a typical studio would charge for a game like Operation: Harsh Doorstop. Our development team can continue to develop Operation: Harsh Doorstop indefinitely if enough of our community members purchase this DLC.

Our goal is to invest in a project that will last forever, and challenge the industry with the idea that communities can build better games for free.

Players who purchase this DLC gain access to private servers, a supporter icon, and access to feature prototypes. Players who purchase this DLC also gain access to the development build of Operation: Harsh Doorstop, linked below. This development build gives players the ability to preview upcoming updates before they're released as part of the core game.

Supporters like yourself is what makes the development of this project possible. Thank you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 270X (or equivalent with at least 2 GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone for voice communications

short_description: Donators on Steam receive access to work-in-progress features, early development builds, private servers, and an in-game icon showing your support. By becoming a donator on Steam, you are also helping to create a free game for the entire world to enjoy. Thank you.
